LanguageData.CompVehicle_CannotSplitWhileInVehicles: Cannot split caravan while colonists are in vehicles.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanRunOutOfFuel: {0} has run out of fuel ({1}). {0} will now move at a quarter of normal speed.
LanguageData.MessagePawnLeftVehicle: {0} has left the vehicle ({1}) due to {2} needs.
LanguageData.InfiniteDaysWorthOfFuelInfo: Will never run out of fuel
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFuelTooltip: An approximate number of days before the caravan runs out of fuel.\n\nThis takes into account all vehicles in the caravan and shows the worst case scenario. This means that after this many days, at least one vehicle will be out of fuel.
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFuelWarningDialog_NoFuel: Your caravan isn't carrying fuel and will be unable to travel at full speed.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFuelWarningDialog: Your caravan is only carrying {0} days worth of fuel and will run out of fuel very quickly.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
LanguageData.CaravanVehicleNoFuelWarningDialog: Vehicles in the caravan must be fueled.
LanguageData.CompVehicle_DisabledDesc: The vehicle disabled, destroyed, or simply too damaged and cannot be loaded.
